name: PagerDutyChangeEvent
description: Uses the PagerDuty Events V2 API to send a change event.
author: Knighton Dev

inputs.name: routingkey
inputs.label: Routing Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The GUID of one of your Events API V2 integrations. This is the "Integration Key" listed on the Events API V2 integration's detail page.

inputs.name: summary
inputs.label: Summary
inputs.helpMarkDown: A brief text summary of the event, used to generate the summaries/titles of any associated alerts.

inputs.name: source
inputs.label: Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique location of the affected system, preferably a hostname or FQDN.

inputs.name: linkshref
inputs.label: Link
inputs.helpMarkDown: The link being attached to an incident or alert.

inputs.name: linkstext
inputs.label: Link Text
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional information pertaining to this context link.
